nodes
Class Location

java.lang.Object
  nodes.Location
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Drawable, Saveable
public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable, java.lang.Cloneable, Saveable

A (2D) location in the field. If it is to be shown or drawn, it should be scaled by using the Scaling.locationToPoint(loc) method.

Author:
Niels Thykier

public org.w3c.dom.Element generateXMLElement(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
Description copied from interface: Saveable
Generates the XML Element that the class can be loaded from. The element (which is returned) is NOT attached to the document, merely created.
